era.game_crash_message:
The game crashed!

If you are using Heroes Launcher:
	- open the "Tools" tab
	- select "Debug Creator"

If you are NOT using Heroes Launcher:
	- open the folder [GAME_FOLDER]/Tools/DebugCreator/
	- run "DebugCreator.hta"

After running "Debug Creator.hta"
	- attach the save file
	- create a Debug Archive
	- go to the folder with the Debug archive
	- send it to the Discord channel "bug-reports"

			Thank you!!!
